cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on September 29, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8466, Chai Suthammanont Healthy Federal Workplaces Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 121 (Thursday, July 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CONNOLLY:
H.R. 8466.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 of the Constitution of the
United States
[Page H7067]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: Chai Suthammanont Remembrance Act of 2022
